config.toms_peripherals.maxVRAMSize: Maximum VRAM Size in GPU peripherals
tooltip.toms_peripherals.monitor: The GPU block must touch the bottom left monitor block. The arrows point away from this block.
tooltip.toms_peripherals.gpu: Drives the monitor blocks and performs image manipulation functions. See the wiki for the list of functions.
tooltip.toms_peripherals.wdt: Restarts the attached computer if the running program crashes or times out for some reason. See the wiki for more info.
tooltip.toms_peripherals.redstone_port: More redstone sides for your computer
